price: Anaasε fa (εberε no) bi ka ho; na fa ntooboaseε kenkan Qur’aan no sεdeε ɛfata ma ԑho nte.
arabic: أَوۡ زِدۡ عَلَيۡهِ وَرَتِّلِ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ تَرۡتِيلًا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: aw zid ʿalayhi warattili al-qur'āna tartīlan
